title: Reverse engineer a table from its description from a SQL query — create_table
code: # mockup table descritpion (tbl_descr <- tibble::tibble(TABLE_NAME = c("my_table"),                              COLUMN_NAME = c("var1", "var2", "var3"))) #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   TABLE_NAME COLUMN_NAME #>   <chr>      <chr>       #> 1 my_table   var1        #> 2 my_table   var2        #> 3 my_table   var3        # now print the table if (FALSE) create_table(tbl_descr)

title: STARFISH customized facets with units on right side — facet_custom
code: facet_wrap_starfish(   facets = ~anon_unit,   ncol = 1,   nrow = NULL,   strip.position = "right",   drop = TRUE,   scales = "fixed",   shrink = TRUE,   labeller = "label_value",   as.table = TRUE,   switch = NULL,   dir = "h",   ... )  facet_wrap_sf(   facets = ~anon_unit,   ncol = 1,   nrow = NULL,   strip.position = "right",   drop = TRUE,   scales = "fixed",   shrink = TRUE,   labeller = "label_value",   as.table = TRUE,   switch = NULL,   dir = "h",   ... )

text: Custom coloring filling functions based unique color palettes

title: Custom color and fill scales — scale_custom
code: scale_color_starfish_d(palette = "starfish", extend = FALSE, ...)  scale_colour_starfish_d(palette = "starfish", extend = FALSE, ...)  scale_fill_starfish_d(palette = "starfish", extend = FALSE, ...)  scale_color_starfish_op(   palette = "starfish",   val_names = c("good", "neutral", "bad"),   ... )  scale_colour_starfish_op(   palette = "starfish",   val_names = c("good", "neutral", "bad"),   ... )  scale_fill_starfish_op(   palette = "starfish",   val_names = c("good", "neutral", "bad"),   ... )  scale_color_starfish_div(palette = "starfish", ...)  scale_colour_starfish_div(palette = "starfish", ...)  scale_fill_starfish_div(palette = "starfish", ...)  scale_color_starfish_c(palette = "starfish", ...)  scale_colour_starfish_c(palette = "starfish", ...)  scale_fill_starfish_c(palette = "starfish", ...)

title: Custom color and fill scales — scale_custom
text: palette Name color palette extend Whether extend discrete color palette make sufficient colors levels needed ... Additional arguments passed internal scale function val_names opinionated scales, defaults "good", "neutral", "bad"

title: Custom color and fill scales — scale_custom
text: Specific functions include: scale_(color/colour/fill)_starfish_d : Discrete palette either fixed dynamically extended number shades scale_(color/colour/fill)_starfish_op\b : Discrete palette fixed colors "good", "bad", "neutral" scale_(color/colour/fill)_starfish_div : Continuous diverging color palette, must contain negative, neutral, positive values scale_(color/colour/fill)_starfish_c : Continuous color palette

title: Custom color and fill scales — scale_custom
code: library(ggplot2) library(starfish) ggplot(diamonds[1:2000,], aes(x = cut, y = carat, color = cut)) + geom_point() + scale_color_starfish_d() + theme_starfish()

title: STARFISH ggplot theme — theme_starfish
text: base_theme base theme upon additional theme-specific options applied ... Fruther arguments passed ggplot2::theme()

title: STARFISH ggplot theme — theme_starfish
code: if (FALSE) { library(ggplot2) data <- data.frame(x = 1:10, y = 1:10) ggplot(data, aes(x, y)) + geom_point() + theme_starfish() }
